FilterItemPortable.Name: Ordens Liberadas
FilterItemPortable.ConditionsContent: <ArrayOfFilterCondition xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <FilterCondition Index="1" FieldName="STATUS"> <FieldDefinitionName>ListFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="ArrayOfListItem"> <ListItem> <Value>1</Value> <Text>Cadastrada</Text> </ListItem> </Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> <FilterCondition Index="2" FieldName="LIBERADA"> <FieldDefinitionName>BooleanFieldDefinition</FieldDefinitionName> <Operator> <Name>igual</Name> <DatabaseOperator>=</DatabaseOperator> <IsFunction>false</IsFunction> </Operator> <Value xsi:type="xsd:boolean">true</Value> <UserInputRequired>false</UserInputRequired> <Required>false</Required> <IsManuallyDefined>false</IsManuallyDefined> </FilterCondition> </ArrayOfFilterCondition>
